original_text: I took the leaders of Judah to go and stand on top of the wall. I chose two large groups of singers to thank God with songs. I told the first group to walk along the wall to the south, in the direction of the Dung Gate. I took the leaders of Judah to go and stand on top of the wall. I chose two large groups of singers to thank God with songs. I told the first group to walk along the wall to the south, in the direction of the Dung Gate.
korean_text: 이에 내가 유다의 방백들을 성벽 위에 오르게 하고 또 감사 찬송하는 자의 큰 무리를 둘로 나누어 성벽 위로 대오를 지어 가게 하였는데 한 무리는 오른쪽으로 분문을 향하여 가게 하니

sentences.original_text: I took the leaders of Judah
to go and stand on top of the wall
I chose two large groups of singers
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 두 개의 큰 성가대를 선택했습니다

sentences.original_text: to walk along the wall to the south
in the direction of the Dung Gate

to go and stand on top of the wall
I chose two large groups of singers
